caption: 🌟 Ready to level up? Remember, every small step you take today is a giant leap toward your dreams tomorrow! 🚀 Swipe through for some tips that will kickstart your journey to success. Let's inspire each other—share your favorite motivation mantra in the comments! 💬✨ #MotivationMonday #KeepGoing #DreamBig

avatar_data.prompt: A realistic portrait photo of a 25-35 year old person, friendly, professional, engaging personality, professional headshot quality, studio lighting, high resolution, photorealistic, detailed facial features, natural expression, suitable for social media profile, modern style

media_prompt: A motivation social media post image, featuring the same person from the avatar, related to: 🌟 Ready to level up? Remember, every small step you take today is a giant leap toward your dreams to, high quality, professional, Instagram-worthy, bright and engaging, modern aesthetic
